origins.name: Dragonlord
origins.desc: After 8 seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

origins.name: Dryad
origins.desc: Dryads gain Ability Power and 150 Health. Each enemy death grants permanent additional Health.

origins.name: Fated
origins.desc: Hover one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains 20% HP.

origins.name: Fortune
origins.desc:
When you lose a fight, gain Luck. The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get.

Lose Luck when you win.

origins.name: Ghostly
origins.desc:
Upon dealing or taking damage 5 times, Ghostly units send 2 spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal 2% max Health every 2 seconds.

Haunted enemies take bonus damage for each spectre on them, and pass spectres on death.

origins.name: Heavenly
origins.desc:
Heavenly units grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Heavenly unit in play.
Heavenly units gain 70% more.

Kha'Zix - +10% Crit chance
Malphite - +8 AR/MR
Neeko - +60 HP
Qiyana - +10% AD
Soraka - +10% AP
Wukong - +10% AS
Emblem - +5% Omnivamp

2-stars grant 30% more.
3-stars grant 50% more.

origins.name: Inkshadow
origins.desc:
Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain 5% bonus damage and damage reduction.

Which Inkshadow items you get changes each game.

origins.name: Mythic
origins.desc:
Mythic champions gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage.

After 4 player combats, they become Epic, increasing the bonus by 50%.

origins.name: Porcelain
origins.desc: After casting, Porcelain champions boil, gaining Attack Speed and taking less damage for 4 seconds.

origins.name: Storyweaver
origins.desc:
Storyweavers summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her. Storyweavers gain max Health.

Each Storyweaver star level increases Kayle's Health and Ability Power. Kayle gets 15% Attack Speed for each game Stage.

origins.name: Umbral
origins.desc:
The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.

Umbral units in illuminated hexes execute low Health enemies.

classes.name: Altruist
classes.desc: Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for 15% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.

classes.name: Arcanist
classes.desc: Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.

classes.name: Behemoth
classes.desc: Behemoths gain increased Armor and Magic Resist. Whenever a Behemoth dies, the nearest Behemoth gains 50% more for 8 seconds.

classes.name: Bruiser
classes.desc: Your team gains 100 maximum Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

classes.name: Duelist
classes.desc: Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to 12 times.

classes.name: Exalted
classes.desc:
Your team gains 7% bonus damage, plus more based on your level.

After combat, store XP in a Soul Core. Sell the Core to claim the XP.

Each game a different set of units is Exalted.

classes.name: Invoker
classes.desc: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

classes.name: Sage
classes.desc: Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

classes.name: Sniper
classes.desc:
Innate: Snipers gain 1 Attack Range.

Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

classes.name: Trickshot
classes.desc: Trickshots' abilities ricochet. Each ricochet deals a percentage of the previous bounce's damage.

classes.name: Warden
classes.desc: Wardens take less damage. For the first 10 seconds of combat, they take an additional 18% less damage.
